column5: I had a bottle of deet that I had trouble opening and when I got it open it shot out on a nearby wall (Real swift move) cleaned it up and noticed two days later it was peeling the pant off. There has got to be something beter than this stuff to put on your skin. Any ideas?

A just announced discovery from a researcher at I believe Univ of North Carolina is a new insect repellant called "Skeeter Shield". Said to repell mosquitos, tick, fleas..., but won't be on the market until end of year. This is not a joke. Was announced on the national news (US) last night.
